meanings.definition: To set or adorn with stars.
meanings.sent1: She instarred the night sky with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent2: The artist instarred the ceiling with glowing constellations.
meanings.sent3: The decorator instarred the room with shimmering star stickers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter instarred the room with joy and light.
meanings.sent5: The magical wand instarred the dark forest with sparkling lights.

meanings.definition: To make someone or something the star of a performance or event.
meanings.sent1: The director instarred the talented actress in the lead role.
meanings.sent2: The coach instarred the young athlete as the team captain.
meanings.sent3: The teacher instarred the student as the class comedian for the day.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness instarred her as the favorite among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The spotlight instarred the singer, making her shine on stage.
